bibl.title: A Greek Iatromagical Papyrus (Utrecht Copt. Ms. B3.8)
bibl.note: P. Utrecht Univ. Libr. Inv. Copt. Ms. B3.8, formerly of the private collection of Carl Schmidt (1868-1938). - The Greek text is a magical formulary against diseases of the spleen, prescribing a medical treatment which includes the making of an amulet.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Utrecht Univ. Libr. Inv. Copt. Ms. B3.8
R. van den Broek, A Greek Iatromagical Papyrus (Utrecht Copt. Ms. B3.8)

P. Utrecht Univ. Libr. Inv. Copt. Ms. B3.8, formerly of the private collection of Carl Schmidt (1868-1938). - The Greek text is a magical formulary against diseases of the spleen, prescribing a medical treatment which includes the making of an amulet.
